import React from "react"; const Home = () => { return (
{/* Header Section */}

Welcome to the Sports Field Management Portal

Your one-stop solution for field owners and captains to seamlessly manage fields, schedules, and game events.

{/* Features Section */}

Manage Fields

Easily update field availability, view schedules, and assign subfields. Maintain organized and up-to-date field information.

Coordinate Games

Schedule games, assign fields, and notify team captains. Ensure smooth coordination and prevent scheduling conflicts.

Optimize Availability

Allow captains to reserve times based on availability and manage bookings with real-time updates, making it easier to accommodate all teams.

Real-Time Notifications

Keep field owners and captains informed with instant notifications for schedule changes, upcoming events, and more.

{/* Call to Action */}

Ready to Streamline Your Field Management?

Join us today to make field and game management efficient, reliable, and stress-free.

); }; export default Home;
